title: The Secret garden
creator_credit: Fred M Wilcox, Clarence Brown and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: A delightful dramatisation based on the well-known children’s book of the same name. A young girl comes to live in a run down Victorian estate and finds an abandoned garden which she cares for. She befriends the young crippled son of the house - with amazing results. Stars Margaret O’Brien and Dean Stockwell. Rated: G
